newsitem.title: USA: International Flavors Q4 net rises.
newsitem.headline: International Flavors Q4 net rises.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: 1996 full-year results include one-time pretax charge of $49.7 million for streamlining aroma chemical production facilities. Excluding this charge, net was $221.2 million, or $2 per share.
Full name is International Flavors & Fragrances Inc.
